copy.title: Camp Pixie Dust Is Coming!
copy.subtitle: Starting June 21, get ready to fly away for summer camp in Pixie Hollow where you can:
copy.blurb1: Play new games with your pixie pals
copy.blurb2: Show off your talent troop pride with all-new Fairy Outfits
copy.blurb3: Decorate your house like a camp cabin with flitterific new furniture
copy.blurb4: Earn lots of new summer camp badges
copy.blurb5: Earn lots of new summer camp badges
copy.blurb6: Show off your talent troop pride with all-new Fairy Outfits
